articles.description: Amazon India said that it will introduce around 10,000 units of electric vehicles in its fleet by 2025..Amazon will acquire Mahindra Treo Zor electric tri-wheeler for its delivery fleet.

articles.description: The Bengaluru-based e-grocery firm last week sent bootstrapped online grocery startup Daily Basket a notice for using the word basket in its brand name and logo.

articles.title: India detects over 24,000 mutations in 7,000 variants of Covid - Bangalore Mirror
articles.description: The officials added that the mutations have been detected in around 7,000 variants of the novel coronavirus which are under circulation in the country.
articles.content:
